body.name: Eyebloc Nanobloc Universal Webcam Covers - Privacy Protection Accessory, No Residue Application, Safe Screen Closure - Dots and Bars, 7 Pieces - US Flag
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 10 hrs 12 mins
features: PREVENT UNAUTHORIZED SURVEILLANCE - Stay hacker-safe in this digital age! Stop hackers from spying you and stealing your personal data by attaching this accessory to your gadget's camera. Patented design lets you quickly enable or disable your cam.

UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY - Control your privacy on all your gadgets by using the premium Nanobloc. Created to be compatible with almost any devices including your laptop, PC, desktop computer, iPad, iPhone, tablet, and other smartphones.

HASSLE-FREE APPLICATION - Designed to ensure neat and secure installation in seconds! Equipped with Nano Suction technology that leaves no residue or gunk unlike regular sticker covers that are messy and hard to remove.

7 REUSABLE CAMERA COVERS - Includes 4 dot-shaped covers and 3 bar-shaped covers that you can use for various devices. Nano Suction material allows each piece to be reused again and again. Simply rinse with water to regain stickiness and remove dirt.

PRIVACY SOLUTIONS FOR EVERYONE - Whether you're working from home or using your gadget while on the road, Eyebloc offers state-of-the-art cybersecurity-related products that aim to protect your privacy and data so you can be safe from hacking.
body.description: Safeguard your privacy and prevent malicious hackers from breaking into your computer and spying on you with the Nanobloc Universal Webcam Covers from Eyebloc!Innovative and revolutionary, the Nanobloc is the result of years of intensive research and development. Featuring an industry-leading design and construction, its straightforward build introduces the power of Nano Suction technology. Unlike sticker covers that leave sticky gunk and residue on your device, Nanobloc has micro-suction cups that firmly adhere to your equipment's camera without the need for adhesive. With its unique design, you can quickly enable or disable your camera during a conference call or video chat with colleagues and family.Created to be compatible with almost any devices for maximum reliability. With its sleek and unobtrusive design, Nanobloc seamlessly blends with any gadget's exterior so you'll never get distracted by it. Simply place it over your smartphone's, tablet's, or PC's camera and enjoy your privacy as you surf the net and navigate the web. No need to install any software! Whether you're working from home or streaming online meetings on the road, prevent perpetrators from invading your privacy with Nanobloc. Keep your data and activities private as you stay connected to the rest of the world.Worried about privacy and security? Eyebloc got you covered!

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.1 4.1 out of 5 stars 2,736 ratings 4.1 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works perfectly, highly recommend
reviews.reviewText: Was looking for something that was paper thin, wouldn’t scratch the screen, would allow the cover to close on my iPad and laptop and that could easily be removed without leaving a residue. This for the bill. You can see how thin it is in the photo. Neither my iPad nor my MacBook use face recognition so I pretty much leave it on all the time. I didn’t put it on my iPhone 12 because I do use face recognition there and I was concerned that it might come off from sliding it into my purse or pocket.It doesn’t have adhesive but it’s made from a special material that feels like a very fine knit fabric and it somehow “sticks” to the screen surface almost with a suction like mechanism. But it’s easy to remove. And as instructions say, if it stops sticking simply rinse it off and that renews the technology.I chose the camp design because I wanted something I could see to remind me it’s there if I was going to do FaceTime or a Zoom call. But they have several designs and solid colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only good camera blocker that fits new, small bezel laptops
reviews.reviewText: Trying to find a camera cover that would work on a new Zenbook and Gram but the edges around the screen are too narrow for a traditional camera cover (the covers are too big and would have to go on the screen partially). These, on the other hand, are much narrower and fit perfectly. In fact, you could trim them down with a scissors if you wanted to. These are also a perfect fit for apple products like the iPad. They don't slide, you have to remove them and stick them to the side then put them back when done using the camera. However, the "nano" suction cups work very well and they seem to maintain their stickiness. Instructions say to simply wash them if they start losing suction. I have these on 2 devices right now and plan on using them on more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Yea 4 Laptop, Nea 4 Cell Phone
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this product in early 2023 & used it my computer & cell. The computer is still using the same protector. However the cell phone, even after cleaning, would not stay. Great for laptops!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Easy to loose
reviews.reviewText: works better on computer. Falls off easily on phone and tablet. Overpriced

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what you need to cover your laptop camera
reviews.reviewText: I love that these don't use adhesive, so your screen stays clean. They use the silicone-like material that clings to glass, and it works perfectly. These were a little big for the tiny bezel where my laptop's camera is located, so I just used scissors to trim it to the size I needed. Super easy, effective, and can easily remove and reuse when I need to use the camera without any adhesive wearing out or getting left behind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars My worst purchase of 2021
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product because I was fascinated by the product description that this sticker can be trimmed as I want and can be easily reused when it loses its stickiness.But this description is half right and half wrong. It can be trimmed, but one side is a material similar to double-sided tape, and the other side is a something like soft cloth. One side is sticky and the other side is mushy. Trimming was not easy.I wasted two stickers to make a small dot to cover the front camera of the iPad, and after that, the stickiness of the sticker disappeared in the process of making it. So I washed it with water and dried it as described, but the original stickiness won’t come back, and only small enough stickiness remained to barely stick to the screen.So, I tried using a different unused sticker to do the same experiment, but the result was same. Once it loses its adhesion (most likely happened when you remove it from the screen once), original stickness strength does not come back even though you wash & dry it. I would say only 50% of original stickness comes back.I spent some effort to make the dot sticker which perfectly fits on my camera, but it became useless since it lost adhenshion. It fell off so easily. Then I had to trim double-sided tape and attached on the other side to use it.It seems like I ended up blocking the camera by using trimmed double-sided tape. I can't return this product because I've already used 2 stickers, but for those of you who haven't ordered this item or just placed an order, there's still a chance. Do not waste $10. Just get the double-sided tape that works better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s amazing that such a tiny item of very little material and weighs virtually nothing, is priced as high as it is. If I saw this item in the store priced at $10, I would not purchase it. I could have purchased a foam sheet at Dollar tree and cut out these tiny little shapes and stuck them on with adhesive dots.Update: been using for several days now; it works great. I’m happy with this purchase and feel that the price I paid for it, was definitely worth it! Changing my rating from three to five stars.

reviews.reviewerName: West’s with a splash of RobinsonWest’s with a splash of Robinson
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nano Soft touch
reviews.reviewText: I love the soft touch and easy placement. I went to use my camera and forgot where I put it only to find that I left it right next to the lens and it came off with ease. I used it again and tested the adhesive to see if it left any residue or lost it’s sticker like backing and it’s holding on like a champ. Will update if it comes off in the next few months. I am using this product in my iPad mini front and back camera as well as my iPhone XR (old I know) but it still works and it fit so well. Just have to center the long camera blocker so it doesn’t cover up facial recognition option on phone otherwise it covers the front facing camera 👌Update:This is not reliable on front facing hand held phone cameras. But it does work well on the rear facing lenses. It adheres better with heat from finger to prevent it from falling off when taking it off and on multiple times.

These little webcam covers work great! Seem well made. Easy to put on, can be removed and put back on and still "adhere" well without leaving any residue on the phone. Very glad I found these - would buy again.
Muy buen diseño y los materiales se ven y sienten bien. Espero sigan funcionando bien después de pasar tiempo. Igual, la entrega en tiempo y forma .
No funcionan, fácilmente se desprenden, definitivamente no era lo que esperaba, he perdido ya varios y no se ha cumplido el objetivo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wasn't really expecting them to work that well, to be honest. But, they do!No idea of the science behind the makings of this product. But highly recommend this product. They do stick! And, can be put on & removed very easy. Great product.
La los portátiles o tablets que no tienen casi marco es muy recomendable. Se adhiere estupendamente y es muy cómoda de quitar y poner.
